mapper.select: SELECT PROJ_NM, PROJ_NO FROM ( SELECT B.PROJ_NM, B.PROJ_NO, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM TB_PRO_MEM A JOIN TB_PROJ B ON A.PROJ_NO = B.PROJ_NO WHERE A.STU_NO = #{stuNo} ) A WHERE RNUM <= 3

SELECT A.ISSUE_NO , A.ISSUE_CN , C.CD_NM AS ISSUE_STTS_CD , A.ISSUE_TTL , A.ISSUE_CD , A.ISSUE_REG_DT , A.PROJ_NO , S.USER_NM AS STU_NO , S2.USER_NM AS ISSUE_ASG FROM ( SELECT ISSUE_NO , ISSUE_CN , ISSUE_STTS_CD , ISSUE_TTL , ISSUE_CD , ISSUE_REG_DT , STU_NO , PROJ_NO , ISSUE_ASG, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM TB_ISSUE WHERE STU_NO = #{stuNo} ) A JOIN TB_STU S ON S.STU_NO = A.STU_NO JOIN TB_STU S2 ON A.ISSUE_ASG = S2.STU_NO JOIN TB_CM_CD C ON C.CD_TYPE_ID = SUBSTR(A.ISSUE_STTS_CD, 1, INSTR(A.ISSUE_STTS_CD, '-') -1) AND C.CD_VL = SUBSTR(A.ISSUE_STTS_CD, INSTR(A.ISSUE_STTS_CD, '-') + 1) AND C.CD_TYPE_ID = 'P006' AND C.CD_C_USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE RNUM <= 5

SELECT TB_SBJCT.SBJCT_CD , TB_SBJCT.SBJCT_NM AS SBJCT_NM , TB_SBJCT.SBJCT_BGNG AS SBJCT_BGNG , TB_SBJCT.SBJCT_DDLB AS SBJCT_DDLB , TB_SBJCT.SCDU_HR AS SCDU_HR , TB_EMP.USER_NM AS EMP_NO FROM TB_STU JOIN TB_SVLF ON TB_SVLF.SVLF_NO = TB_STU.SVLF_NO JOIN TB_SBJCT ON TB_SBJCT.SVLF_NO = TB_SVLF.SVLF_NO JOIN TB_EMP ON TB_EMP.EMP_NO = TB_SBJCT.EMP_NO WHERE TB_STU.STU_NO = #{stuNo} AND SYSDATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(TB_SBJCT.SBJCT_BGNG, 'YYYY-MM-DD') - 1 AND TO_DATE(TB_SBJCT.SBJCT_DDLB, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TB_ASMT.ASMT_NO AS ASMT_NO , TB_ASMT.ASMT_TTL AS ASMT_TTL , TB_ASMT.ASMT_EXPLN AS ASMT_EXPLN , TO_CHAR(TB_ASMT.ASMT_DDLN, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS ASMT_DDLN , TO_CHAR(TB_ASMT.ASMT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS ASMT_DT , ( SELECT DISTINCT(TB_QST_SBMSN.QST_SBMSN_YN) FROM TB_QST_SBMSN JOIN TB_QST ON TB_QST.QST_NO = TB_QST_SBMSN.QST_NO WHERE TB_QST.ASMT_NO = TB_ASMT.ASMT_NO AND TB_QST_SBMSN.STU_NO= #{stuNo} ) AS QST_SBMSN_YN , TB_SBJCT.SBJCT_CD FROM TB_ASMT JOIN TB_SBJCT ON TB_SBJCT.SBJCT_CD = TB_ASMT.SBJCT_CD INNER JOIN TB_STU ON TB_STU.SVLF_NO = TB_SBJCT.SVLF_NO WHERE TB_ASMT.ASMT_YN ='Y' AND STU_NO = #{stuNo} ORDER BY TB_ASMT.ASMT_DT DESC )
WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
